pageContext.claim: “Congressman Bishop is doing a GREAT job! He helped pass tax reform which lowered taxes for EVERYONE! Nancy Pelosi is spending hundreds of thousands of dollars on his opponent because they both support a liberal agenda of higher taxes and wasteful spending!”
pageContext.analysis: Rep. Rob Bishop (R-Utah) is opposed by two third party candidates and one Democrat, Lee Castillo. Castillo has only raised just over 20,000 — not hundreds of thousands and even then, none of those donations came from Pelosi or Democratic PACs.
